Public_Remarks: Don\'t miss this picturesque Colonial Revival estate that is perched atop the hill on the rarely available and highly desirable Military Way.  As you walk up the granite steps with hand carved coping, the attention to detail and quality immediately catch your attention. The property was fully remodeled from top to bottom by the esteemed Jackson LeRoy in 2015, and no detail to attention was missed.  The  basement was reimagined in 2022 to be a more functional entertainment space with a wet bar and home theater. As you walk through the front entrance, you will immediately feel the warmth and coziness of this home. The formal living room has a large fireplace at its center and is the perfect conversational gathering place to host guests. There are large windows throughout the house that fill it with natural light, lending to the cozy atmosphere.  A large office/ library sits off the entrance, making for a convenient and functional office for those days you choose to work at home. The chef\'s kitchen has a massive center island to gather around, and a pass through to the great room that transitions perfectly for entertaining large or small parties. The breakfast nook is filled with natural light, perfect for your morning coffee. French doors line the great room and open up into a lush and inviting outdoor living space.  The outdoor space of this estate is an entertainer\'s dream featuring a majestic waterfall and two large fireplaces to create the perfect ambiance, which is all surrounded by mature trees to create a sense of privacy.  The master includes a fireplace, a large walk-in closet with cedar lined cabinetry and the ultimate ensuite bathroom with a steam shower, two separate vanities, and a soaker tub.  There is also an overflow sitting room that can be locked off for additional space and privacy to the master suite.  A second large suite has a walkout balcony overlooking the grand backyard and waterfall.  This is one of the best locations Salt Lake City has to offer.  Quick access to the U of U, downtown, and easy access to the airport.  This house has it all.

Public_Remarks: MULTIPLE OFFERS RECEIVED. HIGHEST & BEST DUE BY 5 PM, JUNE 2ND. Springtime flirts with a little more leg and lots of attitude and we are obsessed with this fearless remodel.  The wow factor begins the moment you walk in and experience the gorgeous heart of this home--its open layout and unobstructed views that stretch the Wasatch Mountains and city skyline below. Expansive walls of multi-slide glass panel doors cover the entire length of the deck inviting the outdoors in... and the indoors out. Statement-making features continue in the kitchen, complete with double island, high-end stainless appliances, and modern finishes that make for a high-style kitchen game-changer. Hardwood floors grace the entire main floor, a gas fireplace and check out our artsy wood paneled wall. The entertaining options are endless here and no shortage of comfortable spots to take in the view. Our primary bedroom and bath are where modern meets luxury--gas fireplace, grand walk-in closet and gorgeous spa-like bath await. Additional airy bedroom and bath round out the aesthetic in our unordinary upstairs living space. No gloomy basement here--it\'s a whole second living space! Light & bright, a full kitchenette, two large bedrooms, two ultra-cool baths, and walkout can\'t be beat (we\'re thinking accessory apartment or the perfect guest quarters). Exterior spaces are built for summer living, and we\'ve got you covered. The oh-so-private backyard has been freshly landscaped and a pergola-covered patio added--go ahead, have people over. We are located a few mere steps to access the Bonneville Trail for that early morning hike or easy spot to take in a glorious Salt Lake sunset. Smartly located (near the University of Utah, and Downtown), splendidly renovated, and privy to some of the best views around, it\'s turn-key and there for the taking...best get a move on!

Public_Remarks: Welcome to Azure Place, in the heart of Salt Lake City\'s Capitol Hill Neighborhood. This new, all electric SOLAR town-home redefines contemporary living, adhering to the US Department of Energy\'s Zero Energy Ready specifications to establish a new benchmark in sustainability and comfort. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this residence showcases state-of-the-art energy-efficient elements, from solar panels to advanced insulation, ensuring remarkable savings of up to 60% on your monthly energy expenses. Embrace the convenience of an electric vehicle outlet in the garage and instant hot water on demand, seamlessly integrated into a home that champions both technology and eco-awareness. Premium solar-E windows, programmable thermostats, and innovative energy re-circulation systems maintain optimal temperature control while flooding interiors with natural light. Bid farewell to soaring utility costs and welcome a home crafted for superior air quality, enhancing your well-being with groundbreaking building techniques. Ideally situated near public transit and a plethora of amenities, including Delta Center, City Creek, and The Gateway, Azure Place offers the ultimate urban lifestyle. Spanning three stories, this home delivers everything you desire for metropolitan living. From the private garage with an electric vehicle outlet to the serene entryway and adaptable second-floor grand room, every space is meticulously designed to meet your daily requirements. The third floor hosts two bedrooms and bathrooms, ensuring ample space for family or guests. Furthermore, with no restrictions on nightly or short-term rentals from the HOA, the possibilities are endless. Schedule an appointment today and transform Azure Place into your new sanctuary!

Public_Remarks: Nestled on an idyllic, tree-lined street in Salt Lake\'s  historic Federal Heights neighborhood, this stately Tudor embodies elegance and sophistication. Meticulously renovated, the home seamlessly blends classical refinement with contemporary comfort, integrating the original charm that makes these homes so appealing. Grand, lead-paned windows and rich wood flooring accentuate the traditional architecture, creating a welcoming ambiance and subtle grandeur. The main level boasts spacious living and dining areas, a formal entryway, a rare main level laundry room and butler\'s pantry, and a refined executive office with a designated ensuite bathroom, creating the flexibility to be adapted into a main level suite. The kitchen is designed to impress the most discerning chef, featuring commercial appliances, a large center island and designated dining spaces that flow seamlessly into informal gathering spaces and the stone patio. Detailed millwork and vaulted ceilings add to the home\'s character and give the space volume and immense natural light. The grand staircase leads to the second and third floors, offering three spacious suites, including an oversized primary suite with a recently redone ensuite and walk-in closet. The top level offers an additional suite with space for an office or lounge area. Below, the bonus lower level provides additional storage and a versatile space ideal for a children\'s play area or theater room with a nicely finished 3/4 bathroom. The manicured grounds feature a stunning Koi pond and expansive green spaces for dining, recreation and relaxation. Fully gated for privacy, the property offers a peaceful retreat from city life, yet remains conveniently close to downtown Salt Lake City, the University of Utah, and scenic hiking and biking trails. This estate truly offers the best of both worlds: tranquility in the heart of the city.

Public_Remarks: Nestled in the coveted Greater Avenues neighborhood of Salt Lake City, where elegance meets breathtaking panoramic views, this recently remodeled 1978-built residence is the one you\'ve been waiting for. Situated on an elevated .39 acre lot, this sprawling 3,044 sq ft residence offers an unparalleled vantage point, showcasing views of the Salt Lake Valley and the majestic Wasatch Mountain range. Surrounded by nature, the hilly landscape ensures privacy and a quiet refuge just minutes from the heart of downtown. As you step inside, you\'ll appreciate the abundance of natural light afforded by the expansive windows and the multiple open spaces to relax and/or host. The multiple welcoming glass doors to patios throughout the home invite you and your guests to enjoy seamless connection with the surrounding nature. The spacious kitchen features quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, a double oven, and a gorgeous view from the kitchen sink. The primary suite features a private patio entrance, en suite bathroom, and a walk-in closet. You\'ll appreciate the ample closet and storage space throughout each of the additional 4 bedrooms and a generous 3-car garage to store your ski and other adventure gear. The additional full bathrooms include a jetted tub, separate shower, and a dual vanity sink. The lower level offers an additional multi-use room fit for an office, exercise room, game room, living room or whatever your heart desires. The back yard offers a small orchard of fruit trees including apples, cherries, pears, peaches and plums! Unwind in the evening in the privacy of your backyard hot tub or enjoy the sparkling lights that define the Salt Lake City skyline from your patio, and wake up to an awe-inspiring sunrise over the city. This is your opportunity to own a beautiful home in a coveted neighborhood and truly, elevate your living experience.

Public_Remarks: Step back in time with this exceptional 5-bedroom, 3-bathroom home nestled above the Avenues in Salt Lake City. Built in 1965, this residence is a true time capsule, showcasing original finishes in pristine condition, offering a rare opportunity for lovers of mid-century design. Perched in one of the most desirable locations, this home boasts some of the most breathtaking views in the entire valley overlooking  the stunning Salt Lake City skyline. Whether you\'re enjoying your morning coffee or hosting a sunset gathering, the sights are sure to impress. The spacious layout provides ample room for comfortable living and entertaining. Public_Remarks: Imagine living in a residence located on the north bench of Salt Lake City in a gated community offering complete panoramic views of the Wasatch and Oquirrh Mountain range and the valley and downtown nestled in between. This finely crafted home designed by Kevin Watts and constructed by Watts Construction is truly a masterpiece. Immediately upon entering the home, you are mesmerized by the spectacular views and quality of the workmanship. It maintains the perfect balance between luxury and comfort. You will appreciate the ingenious placement and arrangement of the elongated windows that converge at the corners to expand the views from every level and vantage point. Throughout the home are 8-foot solid core doors, 10-foot plus ceilings and exotic wood and stone flooring. The main level has an open concept, dining, living and conversational area with an uplifting southern exposure and gas fireplace. The more informal areas such as the family room and semi-formal dining area are off the kitchen. The kitchen has white cabinetry and granite countertops and is equipped with a Sub-Zero refrigerator and a Sub-Zero freezer, double ovens, microwave, and a center island. There is a spacious main level suite with a large walk-in closet and luxurious bath with a separate tub and shower, and wall mounted double vanities. The walk-out lower level of the home has four complete suites with walk-in closets. The large family room has a warm, cozy fireplace to enjoy in the cooler months and a second kitchen area to use when you are entertaining outdoors on the covered patio or under the wisteria-covered arbor. The backyard is professionally landscaped with colorful trees and specimen scrubs. The soothing water feature can be heard while lounging on the pool deck or sitting on the decks taking in the views. Along the side of the home is a secluded pool bath. Walking distance to the Bonneville Shoreline\'s Dry Creek trailhead and the University of Utah and a short drive to Downtown Salt Lake City and the International airport.

Public_Remarks: OPEN HOUSE THIS SATURDAY, FEB 11, 2023 11-2 pm - Nestled in the heart of The Avenues, this turn-of-the-century Victorian cottage sits, oozing charm. Upon entering, you are greeted by 10 foot ceilings, original wood moulding and floors, and the original Italianate marble fireplace with its functioning gas basket begging you to cozy up nearby with a book. The open and flowing floor plan is flooded with natural light and boasts the appeal of a restored kitchen with new Kitchen Aid and Smeg appliances and a large farmhouse sink; a brand new bathroom with clawfoot tub; restored original wood trim and moulding painted with beautiful Farrow & Ball paint; functioning transom windows; refinished original hardwood floors; new carpet; updated electrical upgraded to 220V; and mini splits (heat & AC) added. In addition to that, the oodles of storage unusual for this era of home in both the upstairs attic as well in the walk-out basement, partially finished with new flooring, electrical, and sheetrock for a potential entertainment room or man cave. County records show 60 sq ft while seller measures approx 240 sq ft as pictured. Buyer and buyer\'s agent advised to officially verify.   While the interior of the home is a treasure, the way the yard is laid out against other homes with tall fences surrounded by lush foliage- including abounding blossoms, rose bushes, flowering trees, ivy, wisteria, a cherry tree along with two exquisite and productive quince trees make for a private oasis to unwind and entertain guests on the flagstone patio. Though this home is registered in The Avenues¬†Historic District National Home Register as the \"Nellie Lutz Cottage\", the charm of the home and yard has affectionately earned it the title of \"The Quince Cottage\".  It is conveniently located close to skiing and within biking/walking distance of downtown Salt Lake City, the University of Utah, Lindsey Gardens Park, LDS Hospital, City Creek Canyon. Add to that the overall charm of the Avenues neighborhood, filled with historic homes and local coffee shops, restaurants, and grocery stores.   Call to schedule a showing today! All information is provided as a courtesy and buyer and buyer\'s agent advised to perform independent verification.

Imagine starting each day with glittering views of the Wasatch Mountains and the iconic skyline of Salt Lake City, all from your own expansive 600-square-foot private rooftop terrace near Ensign Peak. Surrounded by calming treescapes, restaurants, and historic homes as one of Utah\'s first neighborhoods only minutes from the party in Downtown. This all-electric development offers only eleven residences, priced between $626,250 and $646,250. That\'s right, just eleven remaining! Come speak for your favorite townhome with spacious interiors featuring three bedrooms and three bathrooms, two are primary en-suites complete with generous walk-in closets and the third bedroom is whatever you dream. Upgrades include climate control for every level and electric vehicle charging in your new roomy two-car garage. Immerse yourself in a neighborhood where history and modern ingenuity blend seamlessly. Early incentives are available, subject to change, including $8,000 towards your mortgage prepaids, escrows, closing costs, and rate buy-downs, plus additional concessions up to $3,000 through our preferred lender, Temara Stanley with City Creek Mortgage. LaraDean is open every Wednesday through Friday, 4:00pm to 7:00pm, and Saturdays, 11:00am to 7:00pm, closed on Sundays. Come see our homes! Whether you\'re seeking a wise investment with no rental restrictions or envisioning a unique, warranty-backed residence to call your own, LaraDean is designed with you in mind. Public_Remarks: The best of both worlds:  A Utah Historic home with a newer addition offering a gourmet high-end kitchen and amazing primary suite.  The home, which was built in 1872, was moved to this emerald .31 acre view lot in 1975 to prevent the demolition of the Carpenter Gothic style home.  The home was restored and used as the office of the Utah Heritage Foundation for several years.  The front section of the home has been thoughtfully preserved with original pine floors, fireplace mantle, stairway banister and stairs, split window doors and more. A gourmet chef\'s kitchen features Kitchenaid and Viking appliances, bamboo cabinets, Marinace Negra countertops and a large pantry.   Lower level offers a crafts/workshop, laundry and large family room for exercise equipment or home theater room.  A new two car garage was built in 2015 when the rear addition to the home was made.  Solar panels are on the garage.  Mature fruit trees and raised garden boxes make this an urban gardening paradise.  West sunset views are unobstructed.  Walk to Salt Lake Acting, downtown/City Creek, Arlo\'s and City Creek Canyon.

Public_Remarks: Welcome to your urban oasis in the heart of bustling Salt Lake City!  This coveted south facing corner unit boasts breathtaking views of downtown, the majestic east mountains and even the State Capitol all from the comfort of your covered balcony.  This unit offers a total of 12 windows, each offering postcard worthy views during the day and even a better view at night.  Your oversized great room offers a cozy gas fireplace and connects directly to your formal dining room to entertain friends and family in style. Your updated kitchen offers travertine flooring, granite countertops and updated custom cabinets.   Retreat to the primary bedroom which offers double walk-in closets and an ensuite full bath with oversized garden soaking tub.  A rare find in this complex is a true second bedroom and bath, plus in-unit laundry.  If preferred, there is a community laundry room on each floor as well.  Located just blocks away from City Creek, several notable restaurants, The Delta Center, Symphony Hall, Capitol Theater, Harmon\'s Grocery Store, and the State Capitol building, this condo places you at the center of Salt Lake City\'s vibrant lifestyle.  For nature lovers, this unit provides easy access to Memory Grove or the trailhead for City Creek Canyon.  Zion Summit offers some of the best amenities available in any luxury high rise and include a secure building, on-site management, heated saltwater pool, fully equipped cardio room plus separate weight room, billiards/game room, recently updated spacious lobby, a large gathering room with full kitchen that can be reserved for private events, gathering room just off the pool deck and finally a sauna.  Most of the residents have one dedicated parking spot in the heated and access-controlled garage, but this unit conveniently offers two oversized reserved spots which are both located near the elevator for easy access.  Also included is a large storage area not included in the square footage.  For additional convenience this residence is located within the free ride Zone on UTA buses & trains with free access to the State Capitol, Library Station, Arena Station, SL Central Station and even the Courthouse Station.  There is a UTA bus stop right in front of the East building. Your HOA includes all of the amenities listed above plus basic cable, gas, water, sewer, trash, exterior maintenance plus a central HOA maintained system providing hot water to heat your unit and chilled water to cool your unit.  Don\'t miss the opportunity to own this exceptional luxury condo in one of Salt Lake City\'s most coveted locations. Contact me today to schedule a private viewing and experience the epitome of downtown living!

Walls of windows fill the large rooms with natural light and warm the cherry floors. The chef\'s kitchen, with a butler pantry, is the center of a great room that opens to a covered patio with sweeping valley views. The family room features custom cabinetry surrounding the fireplace, and a wall of window brings in light. The generous owner\'s suite offers a luxurious bath, an oversized walk-in closet, and ample space for a lounging area by the fireplace. Well beyond expectation is the oversized 4-car garage (You really have to see this garage) and a handicap accessible walk-out lower level with a 9 ft. ceiling. The basement has great light, is at garage level, and features a second kitchen/great room that mirrors the main floor great room. This could be a wonderful MIL suite. Federal Heights offers easy access to University of Utah, Research Park, Huntsman Cancer Institute, Downtown Salt Lake City, SLC International Airport and popular foothill hiking/biking trails.

Public_Remarks: *Sellers are open to offers* Privately perched on Chandler Drive with a bird\'s eye view of the Salt Lake Valley and local mountain ranges, this inviting Arlington Hills home is the perfect place to settle in the city. The home\'s southwest facing location allows for spectacular sunsets and sprawling city views that are best enjoyed fireside from the cozy front study. The main living area has an equally peaceful vantage point with bay windows to the backyard, which is an oasis meant for quiet morning coffee or lively evening gatherings. The main level also includes an updated eat-in kitchen and formal dining room, with three bedrooms and two bathrooms tucked off the east side of the home. Downstairs is an additional living space with a built-in bar, three more bedrooms and fully updated bathroom. The attached two car garage is immaculate and feels like a seamless continuation of the home itself. An added bonus: this home is outfitted with a True HEPA hospital grade air filtration system and reverse osmosis water system. This has been a loving family home for seventeen years for its current owners, who are ready to take flight on their next adventure. Now it\'s your turn to settle into this rarely available neighborhood, whose excellent proximity to the university, hospital, and local hiking and biking trails make it a pretty sought-after spot. Public_Remarks: Welcome to Azure Place, nestled in the vibrant Capitol Hill Neighborhood of Salt Lake City. This modern town-home, powered entirely by solar energy, represents a new era of sustainable living, meeting the rigorous standards of the US Department of Energy\'s Zero Energy Ready program. Every aspect of this residence has been carefully crafted to prioritize both environmental responsibility and contemporary comfort.  Immerse yourself in a home designed with meticulous attention to energy efficiency, boasting features like solar panels and top-of-the-line insulation that can slash your monthly energy bills by up to 60%. Enjoy the convenience of an electric vehicle charging station in the garage and instant hot water on demand, seamlessly integrated into a space that seamlessly blends technology with eco-consciousness.  Premium solar-E windows, programmable thermostats, and innovative energy re-circulation systems ensure optimal temperature control and flood the interiors with natural light, reducing your reliance on artificial lighting and enhancing your overall well-being.  Say goodbye to exorbitant utility costs and hello to a home that prioritizes superior air quality and groundbreaking building techniques. Azure Place\'s prime location near public transit and a plethora of amenities, including Delta Center, City Creek, and The Gateway, offers the ultimate urban lifestyle.  Spanning three floors, this meticulously designed home caters to every aspect of modern metropolitan living. From the convenience of a private garage with an electric vehicle outlet to the versatile second-floor grand room, each space is thoughtfully curated to meet your daily needs. The third floor features two bedrooms and bathrooms, providing ample space for both family and guests.  With no restrictions on nightly or short-term rentals from the HOA, Azure Place offers endless possibilities for customization and personalization. Schedule an appointment today and make Azure Place your new sanctuary in the heart of Salt Lake City\'s bustling urban landscape.

Public_Remarks: Classic cape cod architecture and neighborhood warmth and charm define this wonderful Federal Heights home. Set among old growth city trees, quiet lantern lit streets, and in an iconic area of estate style homes, this urban oasis has been thoughtfully updated in keeping with original loveliness.  Located just east of all the abundant cultural amenities of downtown Salt Lake City and surrounded by neighborhood eateries, this area is best known for its proximity to the University of Utah Campus including the renown U of U hospitals and research centers.  Affectionately known as the home of Lord and Lovey, this LOVELY home, offers both formal and casual spaces meant for entertaining.  The main floor is chic, not stuffy, complete with a great room complemented by modern gas fireplace, floating shelving, bar and casual dining in the fully renovated kitchen with exquisite countertops, gas range, skirt front sink, and custom cabinetry.  Step through french doors into the backyard oasis under vine-covered pergolas, amid blooming pear trees and paved patio and walkways-the perfect place for alfresco dining. Stunning formal dining room with moody colors, classic \"front\" room with original tiled wood burning fireplace, and four bedrooms, three on the upper level which includes a LOVELY primary suite with walk-in shower.  Excellent materials were implemented considering more custom cabinetry, high-end fixtures, and on-trend finishes in all baths for today\'s modern lifestyle.  Natural light bathes the house through paned glass windows adding to continual comfort, and classic east coast style.  There is plenty of storage, not typical for this period, a two-car garage able to power electric vehicles, a lower level flex space ideal for work at home or visiting friends or family.  Recent upgrades include a tankless water heater and a doggy door.  Excellent neighborhood schools both public and private, area parks offering urban green space, tennis and pickle ball, and the Art Barn-home to Salt Lake City\'s Art Council and community art center are a short walk from home.  Fully fenced, plantation window coverings, beautifully landscaped, expertly maintained, hardwood flooring throughout, and GOOGLE FIBER, complete the top-notch features of this LOVELY Federal Heights home.  Welcome home to 1400 Perry Avenue.  You have arrived!

Public_Remarks: **Motivated Seller**  Seller is willing to contribute to Buyer\'s Closing Costs and/or a Rate Buydown. See savings example of a 2/1 Buydown in the second slide.  Preferred lender is also willing to contribute up to $595 towards appraisal costs.  Contact Listing Agent or your Buyer Agent for details!  As perfectly located as it is updated...This beautiful bungalow on 10th Avenue is touting the sort of features that make this neighborhood so very sought after. In addition to all the charm you\'d expect from a well-maintained property built in the early 1900s, there are plenty of updates here to make life just a touch easier all-around. In 2022, the home got a new furnace, air conditioning, humidifier, and UV air purification system, and earlier this year, the front lawn saw both new sod and an entirely replaced sprinkler system, including pipes and irrigation. Additionally, gutters have been added to the perimeter of the home to help direct water runoff away from the foundation (and existing gutters were replaced). But the interior of this property is where you\'ll find the sort of upgrades that make for both a worry-free and aesthetically pleasing life. We\'ll start with the pop-out windows in the living and dining spaces, which bring in a good deal of natural light and work in tandem with high ceilings to make both spaces feel substantially more open (and, in the former, lends the perfect spot for a good book). The kitchen is sleek and modern with a large island that lends countertop space for prep dining (a great use of the space in this home). A small set of stairs walk up to another sitting area-complete with cute fireplace-which walks directly out to the patio through a set of French doors (where you\'ll find space enough out here for plenty of string lights, a good dining table, and a sitting area/fire pit). The primary bedroom is equipped with a walk-in closet and beautifully updated ensuite, and you\'ll find a basement with plenty of room for all your storage needs. Considering that you\'re also within walking distance to City Creek Canyon and Bonneville Shoreline Trail, this, we dare say, is the perfect Avenues find. Square footage figures are provided as a courtesy estimate only. Buyer is advised to obtain an independent measurement.

Discover modern elegance in Salt Lake City\'s newest Historic Marmalade neighborhood-Bishop Place. Experience unparalleled luxury in this zero energy-ready townhome, featuring a PRIVATE GARAGE and designed to surpass the US Department of Energy\'s Zero Energy Ready standards. Set a new standard for sustainable living with advanced amenities including premium solar-E windows, cutting-edge energy re-circulation systems, superior insulation, EV charging outlets, on-demand hot water, and programmable thermostats. Enjoy lower utility bills while benefiting from improved air quality, abundant natural light, and innovative construction techniques.  Nestled in a peaceful neighborhood, this home offers convenient access to public transit and Salt Lake City\'s dynamic attractions. You\'ll be within walking distance of the Delta Center, City Creek Mall, Temple Square, Marmalade Library, Gateway, scenic trails, and a range of dining options. Additionally, it\'s a swift 12-minute drive to Salt Lake City Airport, 10 minutes to the University of Utah, and 45 minutes to Park City, Alta, or Snowbasin Ski Resorts. Revel in high-end finishes like sleek quartz countertops, stylish tile, and durable vinyl flooring throughout.  Don\'t miss the opportunity to experience contemporary luxury at its finest in the heart of Salt Lake City. Schedule your tour today with Garbett Homes and embrace the future of living! *Completion expected Feb. 2025. HOA does not restrict nightly or short-term rentals.

Public_Remarks: Immerse yourself in the charm of this meticulously renovated home with a large lot in a highly sought after Avenues historic neighborhood. Boasting a flowing floor plan with towering 10\' ceilings and rare two-car garage, this 1907 original was gutted to the framing and lovingly rebuilt in 2021.  Mechanical, electrical, plumbing, and energy efficiency updated. Smart audio and controls throughout. The interior embodies the craftsman style, incorporating original, antique oak cabinetry in new, custom pantry, master bedroom, and living room built-ins. Convenient first floor laundry, powder room, and mud room. In addition to the three bedrooms and two full baths upstairs is a basement pantry and rec room PLUS a flex or fourth bedroom and full bathroom.   Enjoy thoughtfully irrigated low water yards with pollinator perennials, established apricot tree, blackberries, rhubarb, grapes, herbs galore, and raised beds ready for your flowers or produce. Plenty of room to entertain, lounge, redesign the garden, create a patio, or sit back and watch the perennials do their thing.  Ride on the Bonneville trail from your driveway and appreciate a short stroll, bike, or drive to schools, restaurants, shops, the U, and hiking trails. 30-45 minute drive to resorts for world class skiing, mountain biking, and hiking.

Public_Remarks: Masterfully Renovated Gem in Prestigious Arlington Hills. This home radiates warmth & luminosity even under the¬†most overcast skies.Each element has been curated for excellence:¬†the gleam of 3/4\" quarter-sawn solid white oak floors, bespoke cabinetry, and the striking natural marble that graces the immense kitchen island - chosen specifically for its dense white backdrop contrasted by its dramatic veins.¬† The culinary space becomes an epicurean\'s fantasy with its high-end Wolf appliances, making both everyday meals and lavish feasts a delight. The south-facing wall to wall glass effortlessly marries the indoors to the breathtaking outdoors, leading to a sprawling, engineered balcony.¬† Here, you can drink in the dazzling city lights or greet the sun\'s first rays over the mountains, all while warmed by a cozy fireplace. On the main level, three radiant bedrooms beckon, including an elegant primary suite that spills out onto the balcony.¬† Meanwhile, the lower level promises both functionality & indulgence - from its family suite with a full kitchen to the zen-like spa bathroom with its inviting deep soaking tub.¬† And for pet lovers, the charming dog wash & custom-built dog dwelling will undoubtedly be a cherished feature. Versatility¬†shines through with an office space that can seamlessly¬†morph into an additional bedroom or a fitness zone, all bathed in abundant light from its separate glass entrance & ceiling to floor window.¬†The expansive garage caters to car enthusiasts with room for up to three vehicles and an integrated central vacuum system for effortless cleaning. Outside, the grounds invite leisure and creativity.¬† A spacious backyard, punctuated with mature fruit trees, sets the stage for gatherings or tranquil moments.¬†A newly crafted wood shed awaits your vision - be it equipment storage, an art studio, meditation spot, or a writer\'s retreat. From the instant you step through its doors, this home unfurls a tale of meticulous design.¬†Its prime location is the finishing touch, placing the grandeur of the Wasatch to the Oquirrh mountains within sight, hiking & biking trails minutes up the street, and the very heartbeat of Salt Lake City- from its eateries to vibrant downtown-at your doorstep.

Public_Remarks: The Frances Edna Johnson Darger home, designed by Dick Jackson of Jackson & Jackson, is more than just a residence; it is a testament to Frances\'s adventurous spirit and artistic vision. This mid-century prize, perhaps subtly influenced by the works of Frank Lloyd Wright, reflects the inspiration she drew from visiting his homes. Enamored by the rich warmth of reddish Roman brick, she selected it to adorn the exterior, perfectly complementing the long, low lines of its ranch-style architecture. Being tall herself, Frances envisioned a space with tall ceilings; the shed roofline achieved this while simultaneously framing the sweeping valley views below. The carport, integrated into the natural slope of the lot, anchors the home nicely.  Intent on maximizing convenience, Frances ensured that the home included a main-floor laundry area, complete with a linen cabinet tucked neatly behind the washer and dryer-eliminating the need for trips downstairs. The kitchen is a model of mid-century efficiency, with custom cabinetry for china and linens, along with pull-out worktops at varying heights to accommodate any task. The floating staircase, a bold statement of the era, remains a beloved architectural centerpiece. The unique display window above the stairs offers a glimpse of the home\'s character, even from the street, teasing its blurred lines and angles. Downstairs, one bedroom includes an entire wall of integrated storage, while other rooms are equipped with built-in desks and drawers, all intended to maximize floor space. Frances enlisted her friend, Merline Leaming of Clark Leaming Design, to assist with the interior design. Together, they created a home that is as functional inside as it is beautiful. \"There are 9,000 ways to do a room,\" Merline would say. \"If you don\'t like one, we\'ll find another.\" Merline\'s design expertise is evident throughout the home, including in the distinctive downstairs bar-a beloved feature for entertaining. Frances\'s husband, meticulously planned and installed lighting throughout the house, ensuring every corner was beautifully illuminated and even wiring extra switches in anticipation of future needs.  For nearly 70 years, this home has been at the heart of Frances\'s life. From her desk in the kitchen, she watched children play in the backyard, penned articles for the local paper, and immersed herself in a world of art, travel, and architecture through her extensive book collection. Despite her vast travels, it was always this home to which she longed to return. This is a special place, rich with history, inspiration, and love. Come and experience for yourself why this extraordinary home has been closely treasured for generations.

Combining minimalism with elegance, you won\'t want to miss the chance to make this rare find yours. A sleek fireplace greets you in the front sitting room, perfect for hosting guests and warming yourself in the winter. Behind this striking accent piece, a large kitchen with bold finishes and a spacious island invites you to cook a favorite recipe, or else pull up a seat for a morning coffee or chat with a close friend. Upstairs, the main suite provides space enough for a king bed, a seating area, and a walk-in closet complete with its own washer and dryer. The highlight of this space is the luxurious bathroom: with two vanities, a sleek bath, and natural sunlight, you\'ll be granted a chance to pamper yourself each and every day. Multiple bedrooms and flex spaces allow you to tailor this home to your specific needs, while a home theater and kitchenette ensure you\'ll have all the entertainment and snacks you need for a cozy night in. This home also comes complete with various smart features, allowing you to control the temperature and lights inside, and the sprinklers and garage door outside-all from the palm of your hand. Beautiful tiling adorns the home throughout, from geometric accents in the main bathroom, to soothing swirls in the first-floor fireplace. With a beautiful backyard, easy access to the heart of downtown shopping and dining, and a view of the valley from your doorstep, you won\'t find a better place to call home!

Then take in the open feels as you make your way to the floored unfinished attic. The walk out basement currently is used as a shop and storage. Two outdoor spaces both adjoining the main floor make this townhouse truly unique, a deck to the west is a perfect place to take in the mountain views or watch the sunset and the private patio/grass area to the east is ideal for an outdoor grill. The upper floor is made up of the primary suite with its own deck, a second bedroom and a full bath.  The garage is an oversized attached two car garage 19 x 24, extra deep for storage and workbench. Public_Remarks: Located on a quiet dead-end street in the exclusive, gated NorthPointe community in the Avenues in Salt Lake City this wonderful home is literally steps away from the extensive City Creek trail system. If you\'re looking for easy maintenance-free living with access to a wonderful community pool, clubhouse and tennis courts, look no further! Upon entry, you will be greeted by gorgeous original hardwood flooring that exudes timeless elegance. The first living area (there are TWO on the main level) is bright & inviting, boasting vaulted ceilings and ample natural light flowing through big windows and sliding glass doors leading out to a sizeable southwest-facing patio. Enjoy privacy from beautiful mature trees while taking in breathtaking sunset views over Salt Lake City! This home offers so many opportunities for indoor/outdoor living. The HUGE dining area is perfect for hosting gatherings and leads out to a spacious back patio ideal for BBQs and outdoor dining. The kitchen is a chef\'s dream, with an oversized fridge, a large center island, tons of cabinet and counter space, and even more natural light! Yet another set of sliders leads out to the back patio, making hosting a breeze. Right off the kitchen is the second living area, featuring a cozy fireplace and built-in shelves just waiting to be filled with your collection of books. Conveniently located on the main level, the HUGE primary bedroom is flooded with natural light and features a cute front balcony perfect for enjoying your morning coffee, reading a book, or watching the sunset. The spacious walk-in closet has excellent built-ins to help you get the most out of your space. The massive ensuite bathroom features a deep soaking tub, spacious walk-in shower, separate toilet room, oversized sink, and linen closet. Upstairs, a fantastic office/loft area with even more built-in shelves would make a great home office or craft area. There are two more bedrooms on this level, each nicely sized with large closets and a large full bathroom with a double vanity sink. As you make your way downstairs to the ground level, you will find a large laundry room with a sink, counter, and cabinetry. The fourth bedroom (which is non-conforming with no window) is on this level, along with another large room that would make a great theater/entertainment space! This space will make movie and game nights incredible! Directly off the garage, you have a HUGE unfinished storage area perfect for storing all your camping gear, ski and recreation gear, holiday storage, etc. Leave room in the garage for your cars, and keep all of your gear & equipment in this room!! The location could not be better, with easy access to all of the incredible restaurants, shopping, and entertainment that Downtown Salt Lake City has to offer, plus all of the outdoor recreation that can be found in the City Creek area. Not to mention you\'re 9 minutes from the The University of Utah! Don\'t miss out on this rare opportunity to own a slice of the iconic Salt Lake City Avenues neighborhood!

Public_Remarks: Step onto your private tennis court, sip an Arnold Palmer, and relish watching friends perfect their swing. We\'re all a *little* obsessed with the tenniscore movement, and this home is here for it.  This residence epitomizes the perfect blend of timeless design by Georgius Y. Cannon, with modern updates for effortless living. In the kitchen, unleash your culinary prowess amidst expansive walnut cabinets, sprawling counter space, and sleek floating shelves. And don\'t miss the view from the kitchen sink ‚Ä\" a lush green backdrop that will transform any chore into a moment of tranquility. A wide hallway seamlessly connects the kitchen and dining area to the living room, where a picture window perfectly frames mountain and city views. The main floor also features a spacious and private primary bedroom overlooking the backyard and tennis court, a second bedroom, and a versatile third bedroom ideal for a home office. Throughout the interior, wide plank engineered wood floors complement crisp white walls and plentiful built-in storage.  Downstairs, high ceilings and large windows flood the family room and additional bedrooms with natural light, creating inviting spaces for both relaxation and entertainment. The garage accommodates three cars with ease, perfect for your family\'s vehicles, a classic car collection, or a full garage gym setup. Completing this remarkable property is an extra lot, ideal for building a detached guest house for friends and family, or accommodations for the paying kinds of guests. Spanning .53 acres in the heart of the city, this home presents unparalleled space and potential.

Public_Remarks: REDUCED PRICE and Seller OFFERING A **15K CREDIT** to help a buyer buy down their rate, apply towards closing costs, and/or complete future upgrades as desired (although we think you will fall in love with the condo as-is). Welcome to Zion Summit Suite 605W...perfectly situated in one of Salt Lake City\'s most sought after areas of downtown, with spectacular VIEWS of the Utah State Capitol and convenient access to City Creek Mall, Harmons Grocery Store, the lights at Temple Square, Eccles Theater, Memory Grove, Vivint Arena, TRAX, City Creek Canyon, and an array of dining and entertainment options. The charming entryway, kitchen, and hallway all feature beautifully updated marble floors and the lovely kitchen is a custom design with newer cabinetry and pantry space, corian countertops, stainless steel appliances, glass tile backsplash, recessed lighting, and a cozy built-in breakfast nook. 3/4 bath includes gorgeous penny-tile inlays and modern style finishes. Fireplace surround is a true masterpiece, showcasing floor-to-ceiling granite. Flooring in the spacious living room, dining room, and primary ensuite has been recently upgraded to durable LVP for easy cleaning. Other noteworthy features and amenities include: high-end Levolor shades in master, private balcony, 1 car secured underground parking space next to elevator, guest parking, locked storage, seasonal salt water pool, updated lobby and sun room, banquet room with full kitchen, exercise room, and game room. ALL amenities and utilities included in the monthly HOA amount, with the exception of electricity and internet services. SECOND BEDROOM turned into a dining room like many others in the building (could be turned back into a bedroom if desired; closet and ingress/egress remain). Standing storage in primary bedroom and bath INCLUDED. RENTALS OKAY (6 month minimum and no rental cap). Condo is an absolute must see. Buyer to verify all to own satisfaction. For more information on Zion Summit, visit: www.zionsummit.org

Public_Remarks: Classic cottage architecture offers warmth and charm on J Street.  Thoughtfully maintained and updated over the years, this home is a must see.  Vintage touches meet modern and efficient updates in three bedrooms, space for four, and two baths.  The heavy lifting has been done here with a newer roof, newer HVAC(2019) newer water heater and softening system, fully irrigated sprinkling system, and Renewal by Anderson custom windows.  Beautiful divided light windows offer efficiency and high style and a perfect view of the lovely landscaped gardens front and back.  Mature trees along with a cool gazebo, offer shade.  Trailing wisteria and fragrant lavender invite pollinators to make a visit. Original hardwood on main level, updated and warm kitchen, a cozy gas fireplace, garage and driveway, something in short supply in the Avenues.  Bonneville Shoreline trail system and City Creek canyon, downtown, and the University are just minutes from home.  Eclectic restaurants and small local boutiques, along with the historic architecture are some of the reasons that many call the Avenues home. You will want to put this one on your touring list.  Welcome home to 426 J Street.

Public_Remarks: Set atop the foothills of one of Salt Lake\'s most prestigious neighborhoods, this modern estate was expertly designed by esteemed architect Max Smith to capture one of the most spectacular views in the state both inside the home and throughout the expansive acreage.The thoughtful floor plan creates an effortless flow with walls of windows that capture sweeping views of the nearby trails, mountains, University of Utah, downtown Salt Lake City, and the surrounding valley from two levels and nearly every room in the house. Designed with gathering spaces that can easily adapt regardless of the size and formality of the affair, the home excels at entertaining; with soaring ceilings, open concept living and recently recrafted kitchen that offers exceptional work spaces and multiple dining options. Enjoy main level living with a butler\'s pantry complete with secondary laundry, a stunning primary suite with two private exterior sanctuaries and a generous executive office. The walkout lower level contains 4 generous suites, abundant storage, a full laundry room, home gym and a great family room complete with a wine cellar, bar area with full kitchen and access to the back deck creating ease for entertaining year around. The exterior of the home is as functional and stunning as the interior with multiple decks and private patios to easily extend living and dining spaces outdoors. Centered around a stunning pool with its own easily accessible bathroom facility, guests are surrounded by the privacy of nearly 5 acres, while overlooking the city. Along with the pool and awe-inspiring view, the grounds offer further outdoor space to lounge, dine, garden, or enjoy the surrounding lawns and courtyards. In the cooler months, the luxuries of the gated heated driveway, climate controlled 4-car garage and secured package delivery room are all sure to impress. The location of this property transcends the ordinary; it\'s an estate that defines the art of luxury living while offering immediate access to downtown Salt Lake City and the University of Utah, Park City, the airport and unlimited outdoor recreation opportunities. From its unparalleled views to its wealth of luxurious amenities and meticulously designed spaces, this property stands as a true once-in-a-lifetime architectural masterpiece.

The lower level is finished with block walls, concrete floors, ample clean storage space for all your seasonal things or a great tinker shop and houses the mechanicals. One of my favorite features of this incredible home is the property! This home has an incredible .17 acres to enjoy! No need to park your vehicles on the street. Stretch out, play some croquet, nurse your veggies, and relax! This home is truly in the heart of it all! The University of Utah, Downtown SLC, Trolley Square, Huntsman Medical Center, Red Butte, City Creek, a plethora of restaurants, social clubs, library, grocers, and shops are within a five-to-fifteen-minute walk away!

Public_Remarks: Set just above downtown Salt Lake City,¬†in the prestigious Avenues neighborhood, this exclusive and elegant townhome is one of three uniquely designed units that blend a distinct European style with the wonders of city living. Offering captivating views of the city, valley and surrounding mountains, this home creates the perfect balance between comfort and luxury, with a striking modern aesthetic. Designed with entertaining in mind, the main level features a large gourmet kitchen amidst a 2-story great room with an effortless flow to the back deck. For more formal endeavors, a beautiful room lies just beyond the entryway that could be utilized as a formal dining or living space. Every room is enhanced by gorgeous windows that display enticing views, while the abundance of natural light brightens the space. Most of the sleeping quarters reside on the second floor including a primary suite with a private balcony, a spacious ensuite bathroom and a fully updated walk-in closet that lends itself to all tastes. The second room has direct access to the office area, an ensuite bath and is surrounded by stunning cityscapes. The lower level walks out to the oversized 2-car garage, enjoys multiple discreet storage areas, along with a guest room and full bathroom allocated just off the entertaining space. Just outside, the tastefully designed yard has multiple hosting areas, an outdoor fireplace, and a lovely garden space that many city-dwellers are left wanting for. This home is truly a once-in-a-lifetime experience that is perfect for the avid host, Salt Lake City enthusiasts, and those with a passion for style and design.

Public_Remarks: This penthouse condo in Capitol Hill offers the rare opportunity to live in the only unit on the top floor, which translates to incredible views and zero shared walls or noise from neighbors. As such, the home\'s current owners (who have lived in and loved the space for 47 years) say it has the distinct feeling of \"a single family home in the sky.\" Built in 1961 and flooded with natural light throughout, the flow here is open and easy, and lends itself well to plenty of possibilities for furniture, layouts, updates, or additions (in other words, it\'s a unique property and a blank slate). The kitchen is clean, open, and offers ample space for storage in addition to an oversized island equipped to handle prep for dinners, drinks, and gatherings of all sizes. The main suite is spacious and well-designed, and certain to meet any and all needs for your end-of-day sanctuary. And, though every shared space within the condo is ideal, we\'d say that our favorite part would have to be the views offered from both decks. The first wraps around the south and west sides of the unit, enabling you to capitalize on SLC sunsets and downtown in all her glory. The second, east-facing deck is an ideal perch for Capitol views, morning cups of coffee, and watching the shades of the Bonneville shoreline change with the seasons. Location-wise, you can\'t top this penthouse: with quick and easy access to downtown, you\'ll be well prepared to take advantage of our city\'s ever-growing list of good restaurants, a night at the theater, or a walk down Main for an evening sip. Added bonus: for those who love travel, the elevator access to this unit can be locked, offering a touch of security when you\'re out of town (though, we think you\'ll be plenty happy to stay home).   Square footage figures are provided as a courtesy estimate only.  Buyer is advised to obtain an independent measurement.

Public_Remarks: The historic Enoch Van Cott Home, built in 1904, is a stately Victorian cottage located in the beautiful Capitol Hill Historic District. It was held by the Van Cott family through the 1980s and has only changed hands a few times since. This charming home is brimming with character and features much of its original detail. Columned porch and formal entry, 12\' ceilings, hardwood floors, built-in bookcases and cabinetry, divided-light windows, period lighting, and classic bathroom fixtures. There are three bedrooms and two bathrooms on the main floor, which is rare for the neighborhood and era. The home also features a large formal dining room, a primary bedroom with en-suite bath and walk-in closet, a central kitchen which has been beautifully updated with quartz countertops and stainless appliances, and room to grow on the lower level. All appliances are included, it\'s wired for Google Fiber, and a brand new roof was installed in October 2023 (warranty will transfer). In this neighborhood, off street parking is coveted, and this home provides a newer 2-car garage wired for an electric car changer and plenty of room for guests in the driveway. The homes sits back from the street on an oversized .22-acre lot creating endless possibilities, and the back portion can be accessed by an alley which runs along the west side of the property. You can have all of this AND live just blocks from downtown, with convenient access to freeways, shopping, dining, parks, and great coffee shops.

Public_Remarks: Charming Avenues 2 Story with Legal Accessory Apartment/Studio. The formal entryway with a dramatic staircase and original fireplace welcomes you into this Victorian classic.  Both the living room and the formal dining room have high ceilings, fireplaces with original  tiles and summer covers as well as period light fixtures.  Double doors off of the living room lead to a light filled room that is the ideal space for an office or family room. The kitchen is spacious with an eat-in nook, lots of counter space, a walk-in pantry and features original details like the lead glass transom window and a vintage telephone. A bedroom with a large closet, full bath and laundry complete the main floor. The upper level has a sizeable primary bedroom with skylights and a reading nook, plus an additional bedroom and an updated 3/4 bath. A legal accessory apartment/studio with 400 sq. ft. above the garage has fresh paint, new carpet and  skylights that bring in lots of natural light.  A garden stone wall greets you at the entrance of the private, beautifully landscaped yard complete with Asian Pear, Cherry and Nectarine trees. The large deck overlooks the grassy play area and is perfect for entertaining. There is an oversized two car garage with lots of storage space, plenty of off street parking and an additional  storage shed which is a rare find in the Avenues. Public_Remarks: *** JUST REDUCED $200,000 ** Incredible value at this price! Stately and elegant, spacious Georgian-style 2 story, on historical Capitol Hill.  Magnificent views of State Capitol and an incredibly beautiful and very private garden which graces all sides of this fully fenced, gated property developed over the past 23 years. Magical views of downtown and city lights. One enters the gates to this most enchanting property with private back, front and side yards with walking paths. This home was built by Charles and Rachel Barry in 1903, being one of the first houses on Old Capitol Hill. Charles was the General Manager of the famed Auerbach\'s Department Store for many decades. The home was decorated in the highest style of the period and was constructed with red brick of the finest quality with special chiseled brick adorning the numerous bay features. The front porch with its wood Doric Columns has been deconstructed and rebuilt with new wood decking and steps; restored wood columns and rebuilt balustrades on the porch as well as the front porch roof; all verified from photos from the 1903 time-period. A new porch roof has also been installed. At a cost of $75,000.00.  Balustrades of the original design were cut and turned by Heuter Mills of Salt Lake for the second level east terrace as well as for the front porch.  This outdoor terrace is a delightful place to sit and enjoy spectacular view of the State Capitol, as well as the downtown city lights and Wasatch Mountains, and the beautifully designed gardens below. At a cost of $53,000.00. The three tall brick chimneys were deconstructed and rebuilt with new brick corbals, tile flu\'s and metal protective caps, at a cost of $20,000.00.  An oversized gutter system was installed with scuppers and downspouts at a cost of $8,000.00. The kitchen has been upgraded to a style of the era, but with modern day function. There are porcelain and wood chopping block counters, Carrara marble backsplashes outlined with hand painted Italian tiles. The Jenn Aire stainless steel gas convection oven and gas cook top and grill are a chef\'s dream; stainless steel dishwasher and refrigerator and stone double sink complete the look and high-end functionality. A cost of $23,000.00. Rachael Barry\'s pantry has been converted to an elegant ¬Ω bath by the present owners with rare Italian marble flooring and marble base, pedestal sink, and period styled commode and stained glass window. Original leaded glass windows are found throughout the home, from the entry foyer to the library, to the dining room and bedrooms. There are two furnaces, comfort can be controlled for the bedroom area, separately from the main and lower levels. The main level furnace has been replaced with high energy efficiency one. A cost of $7,000.00. The primary bedroom\'s en-suite bathroom was totally rebuilt only two years ago. There are build-in maple cabinets, drawers and shelving. The walls are floor to ceiling Carrara marble, with molded marble floor base and crown moldings, marble counter top with marble sink. The marble walled and floored shower is built with a Euroglass surround and door. All was designed to a modern version of the original 1903 era. The cost exceeded $35,000.00. The home has 10 foot ceilings on the main level and 9 foot ceilings on the second level. The main floor library which connects to the living room and dining room can be closed off by its original 7 foot fully functional pocket doors on two walls. . A new owner could expand into and finish off the attic into a third level, which already has a large west facing dormer window, adding an approximate 800 additional square feet of finished space to the home. The white wood painted exterior trim and windows, doors, balustrades, porches were all meticulously restored two years ago under the direction of a Sherwin Williams specialist consultant and advisor to the painting contractor. Cost of $14,000.00. The present owners redesigned the west facing hill facing Main Street with grass on the sidewalk to street and ivy and vinca on the upper hill from sidewalk to the fencing. . A few original plantings from the Barry\'s remain, including very old English Yew bushes, bridal wreath bushes and huge shade trees, framing the front iron gate. They have created gardens with dozens of varieties of perennial flowers, staging blooming from early spring through autumn.  Dozens of trees, evergreens and bushes have been planted, creating a delightful, private yard and gardens separating this home from its neighbors.  Stone paths and lovely sitting areas can be enjoyed. . An old garden shed was removed and a new one installed on a concrete pad. $2,700.00. The landscaping and plantings is an approximate $75,000.00 investment over the years to enhance the beauty and uniqueness of this property. It has been described by many as the most beautiful intimately small garden and yard they have ever seen. It has been the great joy of the present owners to have restored this 1903 red brick Georgian Styled home and garden over the past 23 years. The present owners consider themselves to be preservationists and caretakers of this property and are ready to turn it over to the next generation. The cost of restoring and preserving this property has exceed $300,000.00 over the 23 year period of stewardship by the current owners ‚Ä\" all done with love and joy. The convenience of living on Old Capitol Hill allows one to enjoy walking to downtown restaurants, cultural events, theaters, sporting facilities.

Public_Remarks: This 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom, Carpenter Gothic design adobe-brick and stucco home sits on nearly a 1/3-acre with terraced gardens. Loaded with architectural details and wonderfully preserved, the 1st floor includes an open porch with Oquirrh Mountain and Valley views, jaw-dropping hardwood floors, the primary suite complete with a walk-in closet and on-suite bathroom, a light-filled formal living room, floor and ceiling moldings and plasterwork in the dining room, mudroom and kitchen. Upstairs includes 2 bedrooms with a Juliet balcony off the family bonus room with NEW carpet, and an additional full bathroom. NEW on-demand water heater and NEW high-efficiency gas fireplace system.  A walk-out basement and outbuildings provide plenty of storage and workshop space. Surrounded by terraced flower and vegetable gardens with rock walls made from stone onsite, there are multiple outdoor entertaining spaces for evening dinners watching the sunset over the Salt Lake Valley. Located in the Capital Hill neighborhood, this property is close to Downtown Salt Lake City and the State of Utah Capitol Building. Head back in time and immerse yourself in the allure of this remarkable residence, preserving the rich heritage of a bygone era in the historic Pearce-Richards-Browning-Aures House.

Public_Remarks: Nestled high atop the Avenues in upper Federal Heights, this one-of-a-kind home is a timeless masterpiece that exudes elegance and character at every turn. With its classic brick architecture and impeccable craftsmanship, this residence is a true gem waiting for its next fortunate owner to unlock its full potential. As you step inside, you\'ll be greeted by a grand foyer adorned with parquet flooring that sets the tone for what\'s to come. The light-filled formal living and dining rooms, featuring French doors leading onto a charming sunroom, offer a perfect setting for entertaining guests while basking in the natural light that floods the space. Picture yourself sipping your morning coffee or hosting elegant soir√©es in this inviting atmosphere. A hidden treasure awaits you in the form of a speakeasy-style den, complete with rich wood paneling and a cozy fireplace that connects seamlessly to the lofted primary bedroom. This unique feature adds a touch of nostalgia and mystique to your daily life. The heart of this home is undoubtedly the updated kitchen, boasting a spacious island and a connected family room where culinary creativity and family togetherness converge. All four bedrooms are conveniently located on the upper level, ensuring privacy and tranquility for everyone in the household. The primary bedroom, with its enclosed patio, offers a direct connection to the pool deck, creating the ultimate private retreat high above it all. Whether you\'re soaking up the sun or stargazing by the pool, this outdoor oasis is your sanctuary. 1577 Tomahawk Drive is a canvas of endless possibilities. Its classic architecture serves as a solid foundation for your creative vision. You have the opportunity to transform this residence into a modern masterpiece, all while preserving its timeless charm and character.

Public_Remarks: Designed by Babcock Pace, (now Babcock Design), this custom built, contemporary home in Federal Heights takes full advantage of views of both the city and surrounding hills. The 4,396 square foot residence functions beautifully with the owners\' suite and home office on the main level; however, the office could easily be configured into a bedroom, giving you five in all. The primary bedroom comes with its own walk-in closet and fireplace with sitting area in addition to access to one of two wrap-around decks. Downstairs, one room with access to the lower deck currently serves as a fitness studio. It has its own private bathroom and jacuzzi, but there\'s also a Murphy bed, easily converting this space into another bedroom. Four fireplaces will keep you cozy and warm all winter.  The kitchen is clean and light filled from generous skylights. There\'s a formal dining area with views. The laundry room comes with plenty of space and doubles as a mudroom off the garage. The lower level sits elevated from the landscape and boasts floor to ceiling windows.   Our friend and broker, Brian Tripoli, came by for a visit and offered this about the home, \"What I love about the home is how thoughtfully designed it is, how the bedrooms as well as the formal living and dining take full advantage of the southern exposure with its array of windows.\" Ditto.   As for the land, the quarter acre lot is filled with trees. There\'s a path leading to a simple bench-- a favorite feature of ours. It\'s the perfect spot for contemplation when nature trumps neighborhood.   Now that we\'ve moved past a few details, let\'s get to the heart of it: this house just feels good. It\'s comfortable, stable, and well proportioned. But in order to experience that, you have to come see it for yourself.

Public_Remarks: MULTIPLE OFFERS RECEIVED. PLEASE PRESENT HIGHEST AND BEST OFFER BY 2 PM MAY 4th. Custom built and redesigned residence by Lowell Construction that takes full advantage of the.37- acre lot, location, and view. This brick mid-Century rambler showcases all the characteristics found in a modern interior design style. The Open Concept floor plan allows all the main living areas to interact. Whether you are cooking in the gourmet kitchen on the 6-burner gas Wolf range or prepping food on the quartzite countertops, you are within easy reach of the indoor or outdoor dining areas, all the while enjoying the gas-lite, 2- sided limestone fireplace which is the centerpiece of the living area. Natural light streams through every room in the home either by the inclusion of large windows of various sizes and shapes to spotlight the focus on the natural surroundings, such as the Ornilux bird glass windows on the south facing deck windows so you can enjoy the amazing views of the twinkling city lights. Light also streams through several skylights and sun tunnels. The Neutral Color Palette in the paint tones or in the maple flooring gives a sense of serenity and calmness. The Geometry of the home is intentionally asymmetrical and follows the contours of the lot. An example of this is the dry stacked garden walls found throughout the yard that create lush, terraced garden beds. The grounds have wooden decks that amble into dining areas and concrete slab patios or walkways leading to upper patio to enjoy the bird eye\'s view of the mountains and ever-changing scenery. The floating, concrete heated steps as you approach the home lead to the front porch and a soothing cool water feature. Natural Materials like marble, and Anigre, an exotic wood are used in the walk-in master closet and bath cabinetry. The master bath has double vanities, soaking tub, steam shower, and heated marble flooring. It is finished with high-end tile, wood, glass, and fixtures. Ipe wood and slate decks and patios are dispersed around the house. The walk-out lower level has a two-sided gas fireplace between the family and recreation rooms in addition to an exercise room, laundry room with a convenient chute and Jacuzzi hot tub. The attached 3-car garage has a mudroom with hooks and lockers. This amazing home is located at the end of a cul-de-sac surrounded by the foothills of the Wasatch Mountain range. The owners have installed energy efficient solar panels, and a water fountain and large fountain for the bikers, hikers and dogs to enjoy before or after their trek on the Bonneville Shoreline Trail.

Public_Remarks: Fall being our coziest season, we can feel the knocking of cool evenings on our front door, so we\'d like to welcome you into our favorite spot. Here, we have to brag a little bit about the comfort and warmth of home, all cast in a contemporary look and vibe. Surrounded by detail, it all will make you beam with joy. What sets us apart from all the smaller units down the way?  Well, let us list them out for you. First, we have over 2000 sq. ft of living space; yes, we have a 2-car garage and parking space on the driveway for 3 cars. Most importantly, NO HOA. Pick your pets. But that isn\'t all we have...the ground level is perfect for work from home, you can meet and greet co-workers if you wish via the separate entry and even offer them the use of the loo! The versatility of this area is endless: home gym, romper room for the pets, extra income as a nightly rental, you can decide. With the entire home echoing today\'s love of modern leisure, we promise we have you fully covered from top to bottom. The second floor is the open living space we live in daily; the deck out back is private, and all the bedrooms are located on top for the tranquility you are seeking at night. Fenced yard, patio, and in summertime, it is all softly shaded for day and evening enjoyment. Let\'s face it: Marmalade is on the fast track of up and coming neighborhoods, and here, you can get in just as the growth is happening to enjoy all the benefits. All you have to do is stop wavering on \"when\" and make the choice to own and enjoy this home.

This home is next to LDS Hospital and Physicians\' offices and is perfectly located within walking distance to both the Salt Lake City downtown hub and hiking and biking trails. It\'s close to the University of Utah also. Built in 1923, the main house is a classic brick bungalow with a deck and fenced back yard, a large covered front porch, 3-bed 1-bath, great light, high ceilings and big open spaces, large kitchen with breakfast nook, formal dining, study and lots of storage. Below the house, and original to the home, are 2 studio apartments with private outside entrances, a xeriscaped exterior, and room for flower and herb gardens. The upstairs is currently unoccupied as it has just gone through a freshening up of new paint, carpet, vinyl flooring, and electrical and plumbing updates. The apartments are currently occupied by month-to-month leases. Current rents are $825 and $675. Upstairs previously rented for $1895, but comparable neighborhood rents for the main house are in the $2200-$2400 range. Please do not disturb the tenants in units #2 or #3.

Public_Remarks: This stunningly landscaped midcentury high up on Capitol Hill is an entertainer\'s dream, featuring spacious living areas perfect for gatherings. The open-concept layout seamlessly connects the gourmet kitchen featuring Viking and Bosch, with adjacent dining area and living room with city and Wasatch views, making hosting friends and family a breeze. Step outside to a large, 0.33 acre well-manicured yard that offers an outdoor kitchen with plenty of space for outdoor activities, gardening, or simply relaxing and unwinding after a long day of work. And unwinding is easy with a hot tub just out side the spacious primary featuring a walk-in closet and en-suite bath. With a South facing driveway and North facing patio, the orientation is also ideal for quickly thawing driveways and chasing summer shade. Short and long term visitors alike will appreciate the second living area and kitchen, as well as adjacent off street parking area, perfect for Sprinter Vans. A Panasonic and Enphase solar array was installed in 2019 and functions flawlessly. Located just minutes from the serene City Creek, you\'ll enjoy easy access to scenic walking trails, parks, and all the natural beauty the area has to offer. And with just over a mile to the heart of downtown Salt Lake City, ten minutes on the e-bike leads from this quiet enclave to endless dining and shopping options.

Public_Remarks: SERENE ** GRACIOUS ** HANDSOME ** Simplicity and Elegance define this meticulous home  ** Beautifully detailed in a Classical Contemporary Style, it\'s layout flows from an impressive entrance hall through to generous living spaces, all punctuated with those panoramic views ** Immediately adjoining the front courtyard is an ample home office/den that catches the morning sun** The Open Plan Great Room is perfect for entertaining large crowds or holding intimate suppers as your guest spill out onto it\'s deck to watch the sunset as  City Lights start to twinkle ** A second full dining area adjoins the attractive kitchen w /quartz counters, stainless appliances, ample cabinetry and counterspace, and it\'s own open-air eating possibilities ** This home maximizes it\'s unobstructed hill and valley views from nearly every room ** The Master Suite is sublime and restful  ** It includes a flawlessly designed ensuite and multiple generous closets ** Also on the main level is a second bedroom and handsomely renovated bath with the same attention to design and detail found in the Master Suite ** On the lower walk-out level, you\'ll find more spacious living ** A classically hardwood-paneled bedroom/currently music room, open plan living and lounging space and decks to enjoy  ** There\'s also a large bedroom to mirror the master bedroom above, a second kitchen ready for your own design touches, a full bath, lots and lots of original storage closets and cupboards, a laundry area and potential for a good-size exercise room **  This home possesses  the three most important assets in Real Estate - Location, Location, Location  ** It\'s situated on a culdesac with no rear neighbors at the top of Salt Lake City\'s High Avenues ** This particular unit has uniquely sweeping views overlooking City Creek Canyon and the Downtown Salt Lake Skyline ** It\'s adjacent to hiking and biking trails linking throughout the foothills ** It offers  convenience, privacy and the solitude of the surrounding canyon ** Downtown SLC is quickly accessible with it\'s rich variety of dining, shopping, concerts and sporting event options ** LDS Hospital is immediately below, it\'s a quick spin to the University of Utah, the U Med, Huntsman, and Primary Children\'s Hospital ** Easy to get to the Airport, too ** The advantages of living in this exclusive Northpoint Gated Community are many ** The HOA includes landscaping, snow removal on streets, sidewalks and driveways ,roof maintenance, garbage, recycling, clubhouse and pool, tennis court, most of the necessary insurance and an on-site manager *** **Exceptional location, ambience, vistas and amenities !! **

Public_Remarks: This almost-new home built in 2015, located just west of the Capitol in the Salt Lake City Capitol Hill Historic District, is an absolutely beautiful 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath, fully-finished, +2,600 sqft rambler that is quietly tucked away from traffic and surrounded by mature shade trees. Enjoy an evening walk about the historic neighborhood, the Capitol grounds, or catch a show at the Salt Lake Acting Company. Enjoy all the parades downtown without having to fight for parking, too!  The incredibly private main level is elevated above the neighboring properties as the lot slopes to the west to allow for a daylight walk-out basement. Wall-to-wall windows around three sides of home bring in an abundance of natural light and a view of the hawk that nests in the back. The spacious open floor plan upstairs is accented with recessed lighting, wood floors, custom windows that open from top or bottom and a gas log fireplace. The great room, small formal living room, half-bath, in addition to the primary bedroom suite, create a well-designed space.  The kitchen features dual convection ovens, a 5-burner gas cooktop, quartz countertops, pantry, a distilled water system at the sink, and stainless appliances including the French door refrigerator with in-door water and ice.  The primary bedroom suite features a double-sided walk-through closet and an ensuite bathroom with double sinks, garden tub, tiled shower with a Euroglass door, toilet with bidet, and plank tile flooring.  The basement is finished with a den, two additional bedrooms (or offices), and a full bath, with a walk-out to the fully-fenced backyard and patio. The drought-tolerant landscaping is simply magical and the shaded backyard has allowed the green lawn grass to thrive throughout the summer, along with cactus, succulents, and two Japanese maples.   Smart home features include programmable/app controlled Chamberlain garage door, Schlage Z-Wave Connect Camelot Touchscreen Deadbolt with Built-In Alarm door locks, Ring video doorbell, Nest thermostat, and a Rachio sprinkler system.  Other inclusions: Radon mitigation system, rack and tool holders in garage, patio furniture and Traeger grill.  Please make sure to check out all of the photos and the 3D Virtual Walk-Through, too!
