Public_Remarks: **This home to be featured on ABC4\'s Utah\'s Real Estate Essentials.** Welcome to your exquisite hillside retreat, nestled high above the capital with Ensign Peak as your steadfast backdrop, ensuring your uninterrupted privacy and peace.  As you look out the front window or from the front porch, be prepared to be spellbound by the magnificent views that sprawl before you, showcasing the entire valley from the grandeur of the Wasatch Mountains to the awe-inspiring Oquirrh Mountains. Every glance offers a new vista, a daily masterpiece to savor.  The back deck is a true outdoor oasis, boasting a generously-sized built-in grill and an expansive roll-down awning cover, perfect for al fresco dining and entertaining. It\'s your personal haven for enjoying the outdoors while basking in comfort.  The well-manicured yard is a testament to low-maintenance living, adorned with mature trees and shrubs that enhance the property\'s natural beauty and serenity. Spend more time enjoying your surroundings and less time on yard work.  Convenience meets recreation with a park just across the street, offering open spaces for leisurely strolls, a playground for family fun, and two tennis courts for active pursuits. It\'s like having an extended backyard of endless possibilities.  Quality is woven into every facet of this residence, beginning with the exceptionally durable stucco exterior, which has never encountered an issue. Step inside to discover the luxurious allure of cherry wood and marble floors that grace the interiors.  The well-appointed kitchen features a new Bosch fridge, seamlessly blending style and functionality to meet your culinary needs.  Embrace the winter months with the practicality of a heated driveway, ensuring smooth navigation during snowy seasons and eliminating the hassle of shoveling.  Nature enthusiasts will be captivated by the wealth of wildlife that frequents the area, from graceful deer and quail to wild turkeys, owls, and playful squirrels. Your home is a sanctuary for those who appreciate the wonders of the natural world.  This residence transcends the concept of a mere house; it\'s a sanctuary where indoor and outdoor living converge in perfect harmony. Public_Remarks: This spectacular glass structure sits high on Capitol Hill overlooking the magnificent mountains, valley and downtown. The .71 acre lot on a quiet lane ensures privacy. Every room is bathed in fresh natural light and the ambiance and views are panoramic. The layout is the ultimate with an incredible way oversized \"great room\" at center, two guest suites off to the side and a true owner\'s retreat tucked in its very own wing at the east view pinnacle.  The entry level has a detailed triple garage, luxe modern entry with glass and marble, rec spaces and a guest suite. Wood and glass stairs lead up to the dramatic entertaining/living space. The kitchen is like no other in that it has deluxe European custom cabinets in two sections....an open exhibition island area and a setback butler\'s pantry with tons of storage workspace. There is dining, den, sitting and media spaces all defined without partitions and warmed by fireplaces. Decks flow out the front while ground level patio space is a step from the kitchen. The baths are all high-end. The owner\'s suite has huge wardrobe area a marble spa bath. Another fireplace enhances the luxurious suite and a private deck soaks in the beauty outside. The curb appeal is off the charts with architectural concrete planters designed to visually give the house a floating sensibility. Every detail here matters, and the effect all told is stunning. A great lot and finally a house truly designed to perfection.

Public_Remarks: Welcome to Engaging Ensign Vista - a classic 2-story floorplan, but with more space than you can imagine! Walk into a lovely foyer with an office on the right and a living room on the left with towering vaulted ceilings. The heart of the home is the great room with an extra-large kitchen, tons of dining space (with a formal dining room, bar seating, and semi-formal dining area), huge family room, and views of the gorgeous yard! Venture upstairs to find the sizable primary bedroom, complete with an en-suite bathroom and a spacious closet. Two additional large bedrooms and a full bathroom provide plenty of room for family or guests. You will also love the convenience of an upstairs laundry room! The downstairs area offers even more living space with an additional bedroom, a bathroom, a two bonus rooms with walk-out access to the yard, and a huge family area, perfect for gatherings or a cozy night in. The basement also has all new carpet and paint and the home has a brand new roof as of 2024! You will love the large windows throughout the home, which allow for an abundance of natural light. The backyard is beautifully manicured and very large for the area, with patios, grass areas, mature trees and landscaping, and an amazing storage shed! Located directly across the street from Ensign Downs Park, this home offers immediate access to outdoor recreation and the beauty of nature. The Ensign Peak trailhead is just down the street, providing endless opportunities for hiking and exploration. Situated in the highly desirable Capitol Hill neighborhood and with close access to City Creek Canyon, the airport, downtown, and freeways, you won\'t want to miss your chance to make this home your own! It\'s a rare find in this neighborhood and price point! Buyer to verify all MLS information, including square footage.

Located in the highly sought-after Federal Heights neighborhood, this home is just minutes from downtown Salt Lake City, with its vibrant dining, shopping, and entertainment options. It is also conveniently located near major highways, making it easy to explore the surrounding areas and enjoy all that Utah offers. This architecturally significant mid-century modern home is truly a work of art. Don\'t miss your chance to own this one-of-a-kind gem and experience the ultimate in modern living.

Public_Remarks: This luxurious townhome lends sophistication and the distinct feeling of a more sizable estate to the lower Avenues, where residents are within walking distance to Memory Grove, City Creek, and the many amazing restaurants, bars, and venues of downtown Salt Lake City. Replete with professional design touches throughout, the property has soaring ceilings and ample natural light. A living space on the front side of the home features two sets of French doors, each leading to small above-garage balconies that look to the front yard, and four bedrooms and baths flow seamlessly across the 3,600 square-foot open floor plan. A gourmet kitchen includes Viking appliances, gorgeous cabinetry, and a large island alongside sleek finishes and a modern design. Open to the dining area and primary living space-where a stunning fireplace blends clean lines with coziness-a set of sliding doors walk out to one of two decks on the back of the property, each with views of the mountains to the east. Built in 2007, the property is thoughtfully supplied with a two-car garage. All told, a modern, warm, and ideally located home perfectly suited to the discerning buyer.

Public_Remarks: A mansion in the sky. There is simply nothing like this and must be experienced to believe. This is the top two floors of \"The Wright Place\"... a grand Georgian showplace which contains just four luxury residences. Sprawling grounds surround the building preserving the open space feeling. The gorgeous brick fa√ßade is historic and timeless. There is a chic modern lobby, swimming pool, crisp modern exercise room and customized individual garages... of which a four car comes with the penthouse.  The elevator opens into a grand vestibule and around the corner a massive \"grand salon\" is revealed showcasing stunning moldings, dramatic height and volume and fabulous living, dining and kitchen spaces of unparalleled style and design. Two wonderful terraces flow out through elegant French doors. Casual and formal areas are defined by furnishing arrangements. Two Parisian modern fireplaces anchor the magnificent living room. The sleek modern kitchen is an art piece with function. There is a huge butlers\' pantry.   A grand gallery leads to three ensuites including a retreat style primary bedroom with a French modern fireplace, an exciting spa bath and two insanely fabulous private wardrobe rooms finished to perfection and beautifully fitted with built-ins. The library is glass walled. The main floor covers almost 5,300 feet of sheer sophistication and beauty. A Le Corbusier inspired staircase flows up to amazing open planned game, recreation and fitness spaces. There is a spa bath, designated workout areas, and a cozy media alcove. Several areas can become additional bedrooms, if desired.  A retractable skylight can ultimately lead to a potential rooftop deck. All baths are over the top. The doors, bronze mullions and hardware, and deluxe artistic lighting set the stage. Laundry facilities are on each floor. The windows showcase staggering views of the city, valley and mountains. A huge storage room is included in the basement. If the details matter, this is the prize residence of Salt Lake City! Incredible location! EXEMPT: DINING CHANDELIER

Public_Remarks: Perfectly situated on Quince Street in the historic Marmalade district, this home stands out as an architectural treasure filled with one-of-a-kind details and thoughtful updates. The charm and curb appeal is unmatched with freshly painted trim and siding that compliment the red brick exterior and leaded glass windows that display the house numbers. The lovely front yard garden is home to a striking flowering plum tree, peonies, shrubs, colorful flowers and sandstone accents. The inviting front porch with plenty of room for chairs is lit by a new carriage house light, a new railing and a custom built new Pella front door with a transom window above. The artistic craftsmanship of the unique floating iron and wood staircase will draw you in from the warm entryway that is decorated with an included antique armoire. You can prepare delicious meals in the remodeled kitchen complete with an included center island, gas fireplace, retro gas range, range hood, exposed beam,  pantry with a barn door and a large new Pella window above the sink overlooking the valley. Retreat to the large composite deck off of the kitchen to enjoy stunning views of the valley, sunsets and the mountains. From the deck you step down into the backyard garden to enjoy nature. The open concept main floor has a comfortable great room, dining room, library and a full bathroom. Relax with a good book in the main floor library featuring built-in bookshelves with a rolling ladder, two story vaulted ceiling, sunny windows and an exposed brick wall. The second floor primary bedroom and bathroom is well appointed with a claw foot bathtub, antique vanity, separate commode room, large windows, a skylight and ample storage space. The daylight lower level has a private apartment with a separate entrance, a full kitchen, three-quarter bathroom, a bedroom with a Murphy bed and a living room that can double as a sleeping space with an included second Murphy bed. All three bathrooms have been updated to include new plumbing, new fixtures and unique design elements like a red rock trimmed bath surround in the main floor bathroom. Other noteworthy upgrades include a new roof, new rain gutters, vintage inspired lighting, 2 mini split HVAC units, bamboo flooring, new windows, new sprinkler and drip irrigation system. Parking is available in the driveway or the garage that has an attached storage room or workshop area. Conveniently located within walking distance of the State Capitol and downtown plus it is just minutes away from the new Salt Lake International Airport.

Public_Remarks: Perfectly situated on a third of an acre lot above the Capitol, this mid-century modern home takes full advantage of the stunning panorama the Salt Lake City skyline has to offer. The moment you approach the front door, you will realize that this is not your run of the mill (white cabinets/gray walls) remodel seen so much in this market. Every square foot of the home has been meticulously maintained by the seller. The living room, dining room and kitchen are awash in natural light. 180 degree views from the picture windows, front deck and sliding glass doors invite the ever-changing Wasatch Mountains and Cityscape into the home. Beautifully refinished hardwood floors adorn the main floor space. The kitchen is equipped with ample storage, gorgeous stainless steel appliances, a 36 inch gas stove... a perfectly efficient workspace for your inner gourmet chef! The primary bedroom suite on the main floor has been designed to include a walk-in closet and a large en-suite bathroom equipped with a soaking tub, and a walk-in shower. Don\'t miss the hot tub conveniently located outside of the primary suite.  The living spaces effortlessly merge into the outdoors, highlighted by a south-east facing deck and an additional private patio out the back. The lower level features include a family room with incredible natural light; a beautifully designed second kitchen, an additional en-suite bedroom equipped with a gorgeous, remodeled bathroom; and a new laundry room that will make you want to do laundry (if that\'s even possible). Relaxation, seclusion and privacy are abundant in the beautifully landscaped yard. There is a fully functional outdoor kitchen (water is not currently hooked up), and a large paver stone patio with pergola... perfect for entertaining!   In the NW corner of the yard is a sitting area/meditation spot. The entire front yard was planned and planted by a trained horticulturist who chose low maintenance plants that would thrive in Utah. In addition, plant blooming times were considered so that residents/guests could enjoy color- spring, summer, and fall.  Located close to the University of Utah, The Huntsman Cancer Institute, downtown and the Salt Lake International Airport...this property is not one to miss!

This stunning home offers almost 3,200 square feet of elegant living space, with meticulous attention to detail evident in every corner. This 4 bedroom, 3 1/2 bathroom end-unit gem at The Grove at Marmalade is a true standout, boasting fabulous custom upgrades that elevate it to a modern high-end masterpiece. Step inside to find a carefully curated space featuring a commercial-grade Thermador kitchen appliance package, quartz countertops, custom cabinetry, and premium flooring throughout. The thoughtful design extends to every aspect of the property, from the custom tile work in the bathrooms to the hardwood floors on the main level. The property is not just about aesthetics; it\'s also built for longevity and efficiency. With features like GOOGLE Fiber, a top-of-the-line TRANE furnace with an advanced air filtration system, and a radon mitigation system in place, this home offers both comfort and peace of mind. For those with sustainability in mind, the home is prepped for solar panel installation, making it easy to embrace eco-friendly living without any hassle. The convenient 220V electrical circuit panel in the garage further enhances its appeal, perfect for those with electric vehicles as the garage is prepped for a future electric plug. This exceptional residence is not just a house; it\'s a lifestyle. Enjoy the proximity to the newly finished Marmalade Park, the Marmalade Branch Library, some wonderful dining and the convenience of downtown living, all while being nestled in a meticulously planned community that offers the privacy and space of a single-family home. Don\'t miss the opportunity to make this meticulously crafted haven your own. Schedule a tour today and experience luxury living redefined in the heart of Salt Lake City.

Public_Remarks: An Upper Avenues Mid-Mod Dream! This thoughtfully restored and modernized midcentury smart home provides extraordinary livability in the premiere Northcrest neighborhood. The convenience of smart home technology, charm of preserved original features, sweeping valley and mountain views, and a private lifestyle with convenient amenities, what\'s not to love? You\'ll be greeted by refinished solid oak hardwood floors to accent the fresh interior paint throughout. The main living area has natural light from the south-facing floor to ceiling windows for ideal viewing of the sunrises and sunsets, sitting next to your original floating quartz and agate terrazzo fireplace. An open kitchen retains original character of the era with smart upgrades including new Bosch appliances, with true European convection oven for precise baking, a new atomic era inspired Smeg gas cooktop, new quartz waterfall countertops, a new custom 66-bottle beverage fridge paired with an original built-in curio cabinet. A floor plan for optimal entertaining keeps your dining area open and airy, appointed with new lighting, adjacent to a large covered patio and private backyard with mature trees to make your new hot tub the place to be. The bathrooms have been refreshed to match the mid-century design choices throughout the home. Step downstairs on your new engineered wood flooring to find three more bedrooms, or a future rec room to stick to those new year resolutions. Upgrades aren\'t just surface-level here with new electrical, new recessed lighting with smart flush mounts, Nest thermostat, sound dampening walls in your lower level den (grab the popcorn for movie night!) and two level-2 220V charging ports for simultaneous electric car charging in the sizable garage. With a smart controlled sprinkler system and new stop and waste valve outside, maintenance comes easy. A highly sought-after neighborhood near all the luxuries of downtown, the members-only Northcrest Swim Club, tennis courts, pickleball courts, parks, and steps from abundant hiking and biking trails. You\'re not just buying a home, you\'re buying a community.

Step inside to discover tall ceilings and a spacious primary en-suite that promises comfort and privacy. An updated kitchen and bonus main-floor den adds a wonderful, light filled space with endless entertainment possibilities. The large fenced yard, complete with garden boxes, is ideal for gardening enthusiasts or those seeking a serene outdoor space. Recently updated bathrooms, paint, roof (2020) + landscaping upgrades enhance the curb appeal, making this home a true gem. Enjoy stunning sunrises and sunsets from this elevated position, creating the perfect backdrop for your daily life. Additional features include an extra width 1-car garage, providing ample parking and storage/shop area. This home is perfectly positioned for those who value location, convenience, and style. Don\'t miss the opportunity to make this amazing Avenues location your new home!

Public_Remarks: Historic and modern living merge seamlessly in this quintessential Avenues two-story Victorian on the National Register. Vaulted, twelve-foot ceilings, ornate wood and plaster work, lead glass windows. The original brick was restored by Abstract Masonry. A second renovation was completed five years ago of the primary bath and exterior woodwork. The kitchen features stone countertops, stainless steel appliances including Viking and Bosch, and fine maple and glass cabinetry. The main floor has a study or guest bedroom with bamboo flooring and a full bath, as well as main floor laundry. Upstairs there are three more bedrooms and a renovated bath complete with naturally rich padauk wood surrounding the tub and an adjoining shower with marble coin floor and glass surrounds. The yard is a lush mix of perennials and mature trees. An intimate rear patio trimmed in Navajo sandstone features its own Japanese goldfish pond. Welcome to 137 J Street.

Public_Remarks: Ron Molen is one of Utah\'s most beloved mid-century architects, and this house (designed by Molen in the late 1960s) shows exactly why.  The exterior is design magazine-worthy, with vertical wood cladding, soaring windows, and a sawtooth roofline that remains just as dramatic today as it was when the home was built.  Inside, the original split-level stairway is intact, including the pressed pebble flooring at the entry landing.  Upstairs, the living spaces are flooded with natural light and glimpses of the mountains, and the spacious bedrooms (including a primary suite) are located close enough to the living areas for convenience but far enough away for privacy and quiet.  The lower level offers a large family room plus another bedroom, as well as direct access to the attached two-car garage.  Ensign Downs is unquestionably one of Salt Lake City\'s most peaceful and desirable neighborhoods, tucked against the foothills but literally minutes from the heart of downtown.  Please call for a private showing of this architectural gem.

Public_Remarks: You don\'t want to miss out on the rare opportunity to snatch this little gem. This beautifully updated 1924 bungalow is nestled in the Greater Avenues neighborhood of Salt Lake City. Charming wood beams have been added to the exterior with a fresh coat of paint, that accent the original brick and rock quite beautifully and have created a lovely curb appeal without sacrificing any of the historic features. A mother-in-law apartment has been added to the basement that has a separate entrance. Right off of the back porch is a spacious storage room that is connected to the house. While the views and walkability of this neighborhood make this a desirable place to live, the historic homes and craftsmanship are equally impressive. There is something here to explore for ALL. Residents will feel that they are in their own little town with all the convenient locally owned eateries, parks, and trails, and an assortment of schools and churches. The convenient location makes it so most errands can be accomplished on foot. Many nearby public transportation options are also available, and it is only a 5 minute drive to down town Salt Lake. Don\'t miss out on this rare chance to live in Salt Lake City\'s most quintessential neighborhood! This one won\'t last long! * Buyer to verify all information, square footage figures are provided as a courtesy estimate only. *

Public_Remarks: Welcome home to this timeless estate in one of the most coveted neighborhoods in the Salt Lake Valley, which is nestled above the state capitol and minutes from downtown. This home was originally built in 1998 with the highest quality of materials and craftsmanship, and has been meticulously maintained over the years. Views from the south side of the home allow for sunrises over Mt Olympus and sunsets over the Oquirrh Mountains, as well as expansive views of the valley and city lights. The entrance gate is manned 24/7 for total security and privacy. As you enter the home you are greeted by a grand entrance whose exquisite brass railed staircase frames the view into the large formal living space with a stone and marble fireplace. The expansive windows and doors flow into the lower yard and gardens, which showcase the vast views of the valley. Multiple french doors on the main open to the slate back patio that expand your living experience to the enchanting park/garden like setting. The main level boasts a grand hallway with polished marble floors which flow to the guest suite. The formal office includes cherry wood cabinetry, a black marble fireplace, and ample bookshelves. The chef\'s kitchen is equipped with a new Wolf range and double ovens, a Sub-Zero fridge, freezer, an ice-maker, and ample cabinetry to house all of your appliances and cookware. The spacious family room showcases a beautiful marble fireplace for cozy evenings, and the formal dining room is perfect for holiday entertaining. The main floor also includes a second office, mudroom and beautiful half bath. The second level invites you into an exquisite master suite boasting two large walk-in closets with custom built-ins and an inviting relaxation space. The master bath includes a beautiful soaking tub with mountain and valley views, along with an oversized shower and large vanity. The second level also includes an additional suite, and two separate large bedrooms with a shared Jack and Jill bath, a large laundry room and family/media room. The estate includes radiant heated floors on the main, ample storage in the hallways, and walk-in closets in the bedrooms for complete organization. The oversized three car garage includes plenty of storage and workspace to house all your tools and toys. The driveway and walkway to the front door are heated for your ease and convenience during the winter months. Do not miss your opportunity to join this amazing neighborhood in a timeless classic estate.

Public_Remarks: **CLICK on the tour for a GREAT VIEW of the layout of the home** Local legend and Architect, Fred Babcock, designed this modern Federal Heights residence. Clean, simple lines define the interior. Large picture and clerestory windows line the homes perimeter allowing abundant natural light to enter, while still feeling the privacy and seclusion from the lush green canopy surrounding the property. Multiple private outdoor patio areas lead in to an open and inviting interior space for gathering and entertaining. Two primary suites present the option for main floor living amongst the canopy of trees. Or a second-floor retreat with mountain views and a private deck above the canopy. A large, main floor executive office separates the primary suite and the main living area. The lower-level features include a large fitness space to the west. Another great entertaining area with wet bar, billiards room and a full walkout to the covered patio and included hot tub are centered in the lower space with an additional bathroom and bedroom to the east.To be sold with 1310 Federal Heights Drive. Public_Remarks: Ralph Evans designed and redefined by Guymon Properties, this eloquent home impresses at every turn. The enhancements, details and aura speak volumes to the iconic statement this home makes . The sleek and attractive lines draw the outside in with its floor to ceiling glass, steel, and white walls. You immediately are seduced by its\' natural light and dream of incredible music beaming through its intimate spaces. From the indoor bridge, which is centrally located - like a catwalk in the middle of the home, to the simplest yet incredible detail of bathroom sinks that remind you of a Mui Mui heel from the 1998 collection. You can imagine yourself packing the portafilter of the espresso machine in the morning and speaking your best Italian into the phone about what Vogue has to say about the new art director at Gucci. The Primary suite offers an elegant retreat with walk in closets, well designed bathroom with white marble counters and heated floors. Relax, take in how the home comforts your well being as you watch the city change its winter coat to spring and summer (Tom Ford? Gucci? Valentino? ) dress from the wrap-around deck. As the two story ficus tree soars through the home, you will find a sanctuary of harmony, peace, and pleasure to the senses.

Public_Remarks: Rarely do gems like this come to market: a unique, corner lot, 2-story home in the Marmalade District, just west of the Capitol.  While most people have street side parking only here (or maybe a driveway, if they\'re lucky), this house comes with a huge driveway and a coveted 2-car garage!  But that\'s not all!  This home has been completely remodeled and staged, top to bottom, by one of the best in the valley.  And it shows!  Walk in and your eyes are immediately drawn to the massive 2-story great room with its open railing staircase, dual balconies, and wall of windows, letting in so much natural light.  (Be sure to catch the beautiful view of the Capitol rotunda from the upper level.)  So many thoughtful little details abound.  Like the little desk under the staircase, with the same gorgeous quartz counter as the kitchen, and some beautiful tile work.  Same with the period style tile floor in the main bathroom.  So cute and fun!  Or the trough sink in the owner\'s ensuite bathroom.  OMG!  That shower unit though!  Oh!  And don\'t miss the laundry closet at the top of the stairs.  (It just made more sense than the previous laundry in the basement.)  Views from the top balcony are amazing!!  And location?  Come on now!  Minutes from the freeway and downtown.  Can\'t beat it.  And the cherry on top?  The brand new sauna unit in the back patio.  Relax.  We\'ve got you covered.

Public_Remarks: GREAT OFFER IN HAND, MORE EXPECTED! DEADLINE 4 PM 6/19! Authentic Mid-century Modern design home on rare City Creek Canyon site above the Capitol. Spectacular views of canyon, city, Capitol, Ochre and Wasatch Mountains. The house retains its modern bones but has been redesigned and extensively remodeled for entertaining by its architect-owners. Maple flooring visually connects the space that flows from the living to formal dining to an expansive kitchen remodeled with cooks in mind, and out to the spacious redwood deck with built in seating and a magnificent view.  The landscaped backyard is on two levels and has multiple spaces for entertaining, including an intimate gravel-paved bosque of crabapple trees, that looks enchanting with twinkle lights in the trees. Entering the house through a magical courtyard, you are on the main level which has two bedrooms, each with its own slate and tile bathroom, plus a dressing room. Downstairs are two additional bedrooms, and two bathrooms, one recently built and one remodeled. The family room, a generous office and large, storage/workroom are also on this walkout  basement level, which is finished with tiles and slate flooring in the public spaces. There are 14 mature fruit-bearing trees on the property: two plums, two cherries, two pears, five apple, one apricot and two peach trees. New efficient furnace, 22 solar panels, and double pane windows ensure low utility bills. Included in the sale are dishwasher, induction cooktop, oven, refrigerator, freezer, window coverings, chandelier, built-in storage units in bedrooms and dressing room, deck cushions, built-in bookcases, storage room island, garage steel shelving.

Public_Remarks: This darling home on of H St is just a stones throw from the Governor\'s Mansion.  From its welcoming front porch, you know there\'s something spectacular inside. Built originally in 1908, the residence has undergone extensive, top to bottom renovation with its newest improvements being HVAC and Hot Water Heater. The interior has been impeccably restored to keep its historical elegance while enjoying all the modern conveniences.  On the main, the ceilings are tall and there is no shortage of windows, keeping the interior feeling light and airy. The living room is just off the entry with an original tiled fireplace, and gorgeous built-in bookshelves.  The kitchen has been updated with both aesthetics and function in mind with wooden cabinetry and top of the line appliances. Also on the main you\'ll find the owner\'s suite with its own luxury bathroom. Upstairs is a small den, two more sizable bedrooms with two additional bathrooms as well as one adorable secret cubby space, prefect for a reading corner.  The walkout basement has high ceilings, exposed brick and a funky urban feel.  Outside, there\'s a two car garage (almost unheard of in the avenues) and still a large enough yard and fabulous back deck to host your next garden party.  This home is a treasure in a walkable neighborhood that\'s just around the corner from restaurants, coffee shops, the University and Downtown. Buyer is advised to verify to their satisfaction all material facts.

Public_Remarks: ***PRICE REDUCTION*** Welcome to your panoramic retreat in the heart of Salt Lake City\'s Upper Avenues! Perched atop Hilltop Road, this well-maintained Mid-Century Modern property offers unparalleled vistas of the entire Salt Lake City valley, Great Salt Lake and the majestic Wasatch Mountains. From sunrise to sunset, every moment is a breathtaking portrayal of urban charm and natural splendor.  The expansive windows and strategically designed living spaces ensure that these panoramic views are a central feature of daily life. Imagine waking up to the soft glow of dawn illuminating the city below, or relaxing in the evening as the city lights twinkle against the backdrop of snow-capped peaks.   This home\'s unique positioning on one of the largest lots on Hilltop Road not only provides privacy and flat space but also maximizes the stunning views from every angle. Whether you\'re entertaining guests in the spacious living areas or enjoying quiet moments on one of the outdoor decks, the panoramic beauty of Salt Lake City is always on display.  Escape the city\'s hustle and bustle as you step into this coveted High Avenues living experience. The home\'s design echoes the timeless elegance of Mid-Century Modern architecture including natural stone, a floating staircase, an indoor atrium and a sunken family room, all blending seamlessly with the surrounding natural beauty.   Embrace an active lifestyle with direct access to the expansive Bonneville Shoreline multiuse trail system. Whether it\'s walking, hiking, dog walking, biking, running, or snowshoeing, you\'ll find endless opportunities just outside your front door.  Indulge in the tranquility of quiet living while being only minutes away from downtown SLC. Plus, enjoy the convenience of a neighborhood homeowner\'s swimming pool membership, perfect for relaxing and unwinding.  This location offers more than just a home; it\'s a lifestyle. Close to schools, parks, charming Avenue dining, shopping, and essential services, every aspect of modern living is within reach.  Don\'t miss this rare opportunity to own a piece of Salt Lake City\'s iconic landscape. Schedule your tour today and experience Hilltop Road\'s extraordinary living firsthand.

Public_Remarks: Located in the downtown Capitol Hill neighborhood, this contemporary one of a kind home includes 4 open and airy bedrooms, 2.5 updated bathrooms, and a very desirable work-from-home office space. From the moment you cross the threshold, you\'re immediately immersed in a completely customized, ultra modern space that\'s both functional and welcoming. You will love the walk-out lower level family room, as well as the floor to ceiling windows which offer gorgeous views off the back deck. Whether you\'re enjoying the scenery from inside with a cup of coffee in hand during the winter months, or celebrating and mingling on the large outdoor patio entertaining area during the warmer months, this is a home that is built with your social calendar in mind. The kitchen boasts a large prep island, sleek granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, high luminosity accent lighting and a gas range that will help you achieve culinary perfection. At the end of a long day, enjoy the top floor private master suite, complete with a private deck that showcases Utah\'s world-class mountain views. And if you don\'t feel like going into the office on Monday morning? Feel free to utilize the large, adjacent, vaulted loft as a flex space that would be perfect for an at home office - or gym! or even an art studio. The structure is great, the floor plan is a contemporary dream, but there\'s still one thing that makes this house the perfect home: the smart features. Sleep safely and securely knowing that you\'ve got wifi-enabled electronic door locks, a Nest thermostat system, and a monitored alarm system ambiance. If you\'ve got a bit of a wild side, you\'ll adore the detached, over-size two car garage, offering plenty of storage space for outdoor gear, and boasting a lifetime metal roof. This home, and it\'s charming, historic neighborhood are located just minutes away from the SLC airport and the cultural hub that makes up the city center

Public_Remarks: When I was a child, I used to watch the adults scanning the sand looking for treasures: lost Roman gold coins or just simply missing keys.  I asked my father for a metal detector, but he didn\'t buy into my passing childhood whims.  So, now as an adult, I\'m scanning estate sales looking for that elusive Poul Kjaerholm or Florence Knoll furniture piece.  But, what really gets me excited is when I find an architect\'s name on old blueprints inside one of these amazing homes I\'m selling.  The blueprints for this home have a signature belonging to Dan A. Weggeland.  Not much is known of Dan.  This is one of his early works, perhaps designed for someone that he knew.  This is one of only two residences that I know of by him (the other is on Hillside, just below the Capitol building).  He\'s known to have designed some small commercial projects around Salt Lake City and Ogden, an Indian Housing project in Keyents, Arizona, and a Travel Center Cafe and Lounge in Wyoming.  Like most modern homes of its era, this one is very private in front, with an extended stack stone wall.  The back of the house is a post and beam construction, framing in walls of windows.  Dan\'s design exhibits a refined minimalism, with intimate spaces that divide the interior.  His use of stone and cedar makes this house feel grounded to nature and the energy of the soft modern movement of the Pacific Northwest.  The home is designed to take in the valley and city views below.  It\'s been well cared for by the previous and current owners, with a noticeably well-tended garden that extends the living space in both the front and back of the house in the warmer months.  Dan Weggeland\'s talents are not lost on those who appreciate beauty and truly good design.  This home is ready for the next stewards who recognize the treasure within its walls.

Public_Remarks: Rarely available penthouse in Zion Summit\'s West Tower. Upon entering, you\'ll experience an intimate view of Salt Lake\'s Temple Square, the city skyline, a peek of the Wasatch Front and sweeping valley views to the South. The private balcony overlooks the Conference Center\'s landscaped rooftop. Enjoy a tasteful and timeless renovation including surround sound in living room, 10 ft high ceilings, warm Portuguese and Brazilian stone finishes and tiles and custom cabinetry throughout. On cold winter nights, savor the stately mantle showcasing the living room gas fireplace. Inviting large kitchen island with built in dining seating and high-end stainless-steel appliances. Hidden stackable washer and dryer. Originally a 2 bedroom, Sellers recognized the value of opening the space to maximize views and created a home office area off the bedroom. Private bathroom suite has double sinks, walk-in shower, walk-in closet with shelving so no need for a dresser, oversized mirror behind king sized bed. Flows well. Google fiber installed. Two highly prized parking stalls, one secure storage unit and one 17x17 storage room with private entrance (a must see!). Long-term rentals only (6 month minimum). Walking distance to the Capitol, all the attractive downtown amenities including Trax, the Family History Library, Temple Square, Symphony Hall, City Creek Mall, Capitol Theatre and Harmon\'s grocery store. Close to outdoor activities, picnic in Memory Grove and hike in foothills of City Creek Canyon. UTA bus stop near front door.

Public_Remarks: Nestled in the heart of the prestigious Upper Avenues of Salt Lake City, this stunning 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom home is a true masterpiece that has been meticulously remodeled inside and out. Offering the perfect blend of classic charm and modern elegance, this residence is a sanctuary of style and comfort.  As you step inside, you\'ll be greeted by an awe-inspiring interior that effortlessly combines form and function.  The main floor boasts a seamless open layout with 10\' ceiling heights. Here, you\'ll find two bedrooms, a full bath, an inviting mudroom, a walk-in pantry, a convenient laundry room, and a spacious great room that includes the open but connected family, kitchen, and dining areas. Whether you\'re enjoying a cozy family night or entertaining friends, this space is designed for every occasion.  The second story features an enormous master suite, a private retreat in its own right. With a walk-in euro-glass shower, separate soaking tub, dual vanites, and not one but two walk-in closets, it\'s the epitome of luxury living.  The fully functional basement offers a separate entrance, an expansive family room, another bedroom, complete with a full bath. With ceiling heights over 7\', it\'s perfect for guests, a home office, or a growing family.  The exterior features a large private and flat backyard with meticulous landscaping, perfect for outdoor gatherings and relaxation. The large pergola at the back of the house provides ample covered parking space for two cars of any size and features a long private driveway and convenient drive-thru alley access. The parking pergola doubles as a covered entertaining space, offering versatility for your lifestyle. Additional storage is available with a generously sized cold storage area in the basement and a large backyard shed.  Every aspect of this home was fully renovated in 2020. The outside has a new roof and gutters and fresh exterior paint and the inside has updated plumbing, electrical, sheetrock, paint, carpet, hardwoods, cabinets, and countertops that make this a move-in-ready masterpiece. Rest easy knowing that the home had a sewer scope and inspection in 2020 and passed with ease.  Don\'t miss your chance to own this exceptional piece of Upper Avenues living. Contact us today to schedule a viewing and experience the essence of timeless charm and modern luxury. This is not just a home; it\'s a lifestyle.
